statements: SELECT * FROM SolarFarmInstallations;
SELECT id, project_name FROM SolarFarmInstallations WHERE forecasted_revenue > 5000;
SELECT project_name, installation_date FROM SolarFarmInstallations ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM SolarFarmInstallations WHERE total_cost < 10000 ORDER BY actual_revenue DESC;
SELECT developer_id, SUM(forecasted_revenue) AS total_forecasted_revenue FROM SolarFarmInstallations GROUP BY developer_id;
SELECT * FROM SolarFarmInstallations WHERE total_cost > 500000 ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, forecasted_revenue FROM SolarFarmInstallations WHERE developer_id = 1 AND actual_revenue > forecasted_revenue ORDER BY installation_date ASC;
SELECT project_name, installation_date, total_cost FROM SolarFarmInstallations WHERE forecasted_revenue < 1000000 ORDER BY total_cost DESC;
SELECT developer_id, SUM(total_cost) AS total_costs FROM SolarFarmInstallations GROUP BY developer_id HAVING total_costs > 2000000 ORDER BY total_costs DESC;
SELECT project_name, actual_revenue FROM SolarFarmInstallations WHERE installation_date > '2022-01-01' AND installation_date < '2023-01-01' ORDER BY actual_revenue DESC;
SELECT * FROM solar_projects;
SELECT project_id, project_name, location FROM solar_projects;
SELECT project_id, project_name, total_cost FROM solar_projects WHERE total_cost > 100000;
SELECT project_name, location, start_date, end_date FROM solar_projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM financial_forecasts WHERE profit > revenue - expenses;
SELECT project_name, location, total_cost FROM solar_projects WHERE total_cost > 100000 ORDER BY total_cost DESC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM solar_projects WHERE location = 'California';
SELECT project_id, revenue, expenses, profit FROM financial_forecasts WHERE forecast_date >= '2022-01-01' AND forecast_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM solar_projects WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-03-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY location DESC, project_name ASC;

SELECT project_id, project_name, revenue - expenses AS net_profit FROM solar_projects INNER JOIN financial_forecasts ON solar_projects.project_id = financial_forecasts.project_id WHERE net_profit > 5000;
SELECT * FROM solar_farms ORDER BY area ASC;
SELECT location, capacity FROM solar_farms WHERE area > 50;
SELECT location, capacity FROM solar_farms WHERE forecast BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT id, location, capacity FROM solar_farms WHERE location LIKE 'C%';
SELECT id, area, location FROM solar_farms WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM solar_farms ORDER BY area DESC, location ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT location, area, capacity FROM solar_farms WHERE area > 1000 ORDER BY location
SELECT location, capacity, forecast from solar_farms WHERE forecast < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY forecast DESC
SELECT f.date, f.energy_output, f.weather_conditions, s.area FROM forecasts f JOIN solar_farms s ON f.project_id = s.id

SELECT s.location, SUM(fd.revenue) AS total_revenue, SUM(fd.expenses) AS total_expenses, SUM(fd.profit) AS total_profit FROM financial_data fd JOIN solar_farms s ON fd.project_id = s.id GROUP BY s.location
SELECT * FROM solar_farms;
SELECT name, location, capacity FROM solar_farms WHERE capacity > 50;
SELECT id, profit FROM financial_data WHERE year = 2021;
SELECT company, country FROM developers WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM forecasts WHERE forecast_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, name, location, capacity FROM solar_farms WHERE capacity > 1000 ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT name, location, installation_date FROM solar_farms WHERE installation_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY location, name;
SELECT id, ROUND(profit, 2) AS rounded_profit, year FROM financial_data WHERE profit > 50000 AND year BETWEEN 2018 AND 2020 ORDER BY year ASC, profit DESC;

SELECT f.forecast_date, f.predicted_revenue, f.predicted_expenses, s.name AS solar_farm_name, d.name AS developer_name FROM forecasts f INNER JOIN solar_farms s ON f.solar_farm_id = s.id INNER JOIN developers d ON s.id = d.id WHERE f.predicted_revenue > 10000 ORDER BY f.forecast_date DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT d.company, d.country, s.name, fd.revenue FROM developers d LEFT JOIN solar_farms s ON d.id = s.id LEFT JOIN financial_data fd ON s.id = fd.solar_farm_id WHERE fd.year = 2020 AND fd.profit > 70000 ORDER BY d.company, fd.revenue DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Projects;
SELECT project_name, location FROM Projects WHERE location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT project_id, start_date, end_date FROM Projects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Financials WHERE revenue > expenses;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT project_name, location, start_date FROM Projects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT project_id, revenue, expenses, net_income FROM Financials WHERE net_income > 5000;
SELECT manufacturer, efficiency, purchase_date FROM Solar_Panels ORDER BY efficiency DESC;
SELECT project_name, location, start_date, end_date FROM Projects WHERE location LIKE '%City%' AND start_date < '2022-01-01';
